data.para: Kiliyur Falls is a waterfall in the Shervaroyan hill range in the Eastern Ghats, Tamil nadu, India
Maintained by southern circle of Botanical Survey of India, Botanical Garden is one of the top attractions in Yercaud.
Lush lakefront park with animals such as deer, peacocks & ducks, plus a play area for kids.
The Servarayan hills, with the anglicised name Shevaroy Hills, are a towering mountain range near the city of Salem
Public green space offering lake views, plants & flowers, a children's play area & picnic spots.
Peaceful lake surrounded by lush green mountains featuring paddle boat rentals & an annual festival.
